name: Q1
on: [push]
permissions:
  contents: write
jobs:
  copy-TOTO:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - name: Copy TOTO content
        run: cp TOTO.txt Q1_archive_TOTO.txt
      - name: Commit and push
        run: |
          git config --global user.name "Vocifer"
          git config --global user.email "felixlgrs.dev@gmail.com"
          git add Q1_archive_TOTO.txt
          git commit -m "Ajout de Q1_archive_TOTO.txt"
          git push
